config_ios.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Phone location is needed to send measurements to the OpenRadiation data base. Please accept the permission.

config_ios.NSMotionUsageDescription: Motion detection is needed to improve phone location accuracy. Please accept the permission.
